subject: Football
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: Shahid R. Khan, who has an agreement to buy the Jacksonville Jaguars for $760 million, had coveted ownership of a professional sports franchise, particularly an N.F.L. team.
snippet: Shahid R. Khan, who has an agreement to buy the Jacksonville Jaguars for $760 million, had coveted ownership of a professional sports franchise, particularly an N.F.L. team.
